name: Red Rocket
description: Mikey Saber is a washed-up porn star who returns to his small Texas hometown, not that anyone really wants him back.

review.author: danew13
review.heading: Too Long for Such a Shallow Lead Character
review.reviewBody:
Simon Rex is great as a shallow, narcissist loser. But, he's such a shallow guy, his performance becomes tedious in a 2hour plus film.

Nothing noteworthy happens in this slice of Trump America life to keep me glued to my seat.

keywords: donut shop,small town,doughnut,car crash,female full frontal nudity
